name: Hyundai Verna
details: Hyundai Verna price starts at ₹ 9.63 Lakh and goes upto ₹ 15.71 Lakh (Avg. ex-showroom). Verna comes in 12 variants. Verna price for top model in petrol is ₹ 14.57 Lakh. Verna price for base model in diesel is ₹ 11.27 Lakh. Whereas the price of Verna automatic version starts from ₹ 12.68 Lakh.
